text: f'in 'atlae 'awlia' almayit ealaa 'an alshaahidin almdhkwryn qad athma balkhyant fi alshahadat 'aw alwasiat flyqm maqamahuma fi alshahadat athnan min 'awlia' almayit fayuqsiman ballh: lashhadtna alsadqt 'uwlaa balqbwl min shahadatihima alkadhbt, wama tjawzna alhaqa fi shhadtna, 'iinaa 'iina aetadayna washahidna bighayr alhaqi lamin alzaalimin almtjawzyn hudud allh
